todos.title: Justice League: The Flashpoint Paradox
todos.description: is a direct-to-video animated film adaptation of the 2011 comic book crossover 'Flashpoint' by Geoff Johns and Andy Kubert.

todos.title: Justice League: War
todos.description: is a direct-to-video animated superhero film featuring the DC Comics superhero team the Justice League, and an adaptation of the story Justice League: Origin by Geoff Johns and Jim Lee

todos.title: Son of Batman
todos.description: is a direct-to-video animated superhero film which is a part of the DC Universe Animated Original Movies and of DC Animated Movie Universe.
